text: I'm obsessed with radio. It's a good start to Sunday morning.
author: R. L. Stine

text: A real New Yorker likes the sound of a garbage truck in the morning.
author: R. L. Stine

text: I am up at 3:30, reading the op-ed pages and getting ready to be on the air by 6 A.M. on the set of 'Morning Joe,' and after three hours of TV and two hours on the radio, it is only 12 noon.
author: Mika Brzezinski

text: I have mugs of hot water every morning because the studio is cold, and also because it makes my throat sound clearer.
author: Mika Brzezinski

text: My salary situation at 'Morning Joe' wasn't right. I made five attempts to fix it, then realized I'd made the same mistake every time: I apologised for asking.
author: Mika Brzezinski
